name: Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring the Legend of Zelda - Season Pass
storyline:
DLC Pack 1: Character Pack
Take your musical journey for a new spin with five newly added characters: Impa, Aria, Frederick, Shadow Link and Shadow Zelda.

DLC Pack 2: Melody Pack
Adds 39 new songs, including remixed versions of the game’s background music. You can change the background music at any time so you can listen to your favourite songs while journeying through Hyrule.

DLC Pack 3: Symphony of the Mask
Play as the mysterious Skull Kid and venture through a brand-new map, complete with new songs and a new story. Plus, he has the power to change abilities based on the masks he dons. What awaits Skull Kid in these strange lands?
summary: The Season Pass for Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring The Legend of Zelda gives you access to three packs of downloadable content (character pack, melody pack, & Symphony of the Mask), plus bonus costumes, red and blue variations, for Link and Zelda that you can use right away!
